queryParams.name: user
queryParams.validValues: UUID based user id of the user
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Lists the counts of user journeys

queryParams.name: activeDuration
queryParams.defaultValue: Would be governed by backend settings
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Hard coded duration value which will be considered for active user calculation
